page.title: 10Social Life -Annual Calender
page.content: JANUARY. Frieth Village Society concert. Villagers, the W.I. Singers and the school children entertain with drama, comedy and music. MAYDAY Bank Holiday Fete at Turville. MAY. Frieth school crowns its Summer Queen and entertains her with song, drama and dance including the Maypole. JUNE. Frieth Village Society holds its Garden Party in a member's garden. JULY. The School Parents Assoc. holds its Barbecue in the School grounds. AUGUST. Bank Holiday. Frieth Village Hall sponsor the Village Fete on the School playing field. SEPTEMBER. Frieth Flower and Produce Show held in Village Hall and School. All these are open to general public. Frieth Village Society and the Women's Institutes of Skirmett and Frieth hold monthly meetings with Guest Speakers.
